title: Metal in harmony
creator_credit: Kenneth J. Fairbairn and Central Office of Information
brief_description: Illustrates how aluminium is created, and indicates how much the metal is needed in the modern world. The basic raw material is mined in Ghana then shipped to Scotland, were hydro-electric power is available to create aluminium - a metal which is a skilful blend of ingredients.
